answers.answer: Sounds like ypur sugar is dropping! I usually keep peanut butter crackers around me...might want to get check out also.

I was getting this, and I thought it was gestational diabetes... Midwife thought it also might be related to my low blood pressure or blood sugar. Went and got tested and I didn't have GD but I did have no iron. So dizziness was from low iron combined with low bp. I was always worst after breakfast or if I did too much physically. Go and get tested if you can, best to know for sure instead of guessing!
Same here!  I'd tell your doctor asap so they can test your blood sugar levels!
Could be iron,i kept getting dizzy and lightheaded found out im a little anemic
I was tested for both and nothing showed up. My doctor thinks it's from the heat but even if it's not hot I still get dizzy.

question: I've noticed if I drink or eat a lot of sugar or don't have any sugar at all I get really dizzy and my hands start to shake. I can barely stand and feel like I'm going to pass out. What should I try to prevent this from happening?
title: Dizziness and shaking
